snippet.title: Xuan-Yuan Sword VII: The Third Trailer
snippet.description:
Xuan-Yuan Sword VII is an ARPG presented in a third-person perspective. The plot is rooted in Chinese history and mythology. Players take on the role of Taishi Zhao, a calm and reliable swordsman who was involved in a tragic fate. To protect his beloved sister Xiang, Taishi Zhao starts a journey in this chaotic realm to find the truth. 

Trailer Music Composed by: Yoko Shimomura
Trailer Music Produced by: Ivan Linn

Official Website: http://www.swd7.tw/main/index/en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/softstar.swd/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/XuanYuan_Sword
